Summary: I saw a high beam light.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting on my balcony.I saw a high beam light come out of the sky.I imediatly called out to my two sons," I saw something" They were in the living room.I told them what I had seen.It was solid white.It was wider at the top,smaller at the bottom.The high beam seem to end far behind westchester county,maybe even conneticut.It started up and came down. It happened all in a matter of 3-4 seconds.It appeared like top to bottom,Then disappeared,all at once.That was the first and last time I ever saw any thing like that.I was facing the hudson river With westchester in the back ground.So I was facing east.Im not sure of the day but sure of the month (october2007) and year.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Westchester
This sighting has never been favorited.
